Question
========
What is the best way to think about VS Code extensions when using Positron?

Answerlist
----------
* Every VS Code extension works unchanged in Positron
* No VS Code extensions work in Positron
* Many VS Code extensions work, but some do not—check the Positron list if unsure
* Only Positron-branded extensions will load

Solution
========
Positron is built on the VS Code codebase, so many extensions work, but not all; consult the Positron extension list if you’re unsure.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
